Pages.Name: logic_npc_counter_obb
Pages.Description: Does calculations based on the number of a specified type of NPC in a specified region.

Properties.Description: Name of the entity to check distance from
The minimum count threshold of all npcs
The maximum count threshold of all npcs
The minimum count of all npcs for factor calculations
The maximum count of all npcs for factor calculations

Properties.FriendlyName: Class name of NPC 1 to count

Properties.Description: Only match NPCs in this state
The minimum count threshold of npc 1
The maximum count threshold of npc 1
The minimum count of npc 1 for factor calculations
The maximum count of npc 1 for factor calculations
The default minimum player distance of npc 1

Properties.FriendlyName: Class name of NPC 2 to count

Properties.Description: Only match NPCs in this state
The minimum count threshold of npc 2
The maximum count threshold of npc 2
The minimum count of npc 2 for factor calculations
The maximum count of npc 2 for factor calculations
The default minimum player distance of npc 2

Properties.FriendlyName: Class name of NPC 3 to count

Properties.Description: Only match NPCs in this state
The minimum count threshold of npc 3
The maximum count threshold of npc 3
The minimum count of npc 3 for factor calculations
The maximum count of npc 3 for factor calculations
The default minimum player distance of npc 3
Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.

InputOutputs.Name: Enable
InputOutputs.Description: Enable the entity

InputOutputs.Name: Disable
InputOutputs.Description: Disable the entity

InputOutputs.Name: SetSourceEntity
InputOutputs.Description: Set the name of the entity to base this entities location on. This check will follow the entity as it moves.

InputOutputs.Name: OnMinCountAll
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the count of all npcs transitions to the min count or less.

InputOutputs.Name: OnMaxCountAll
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the count of all npcs transitions to the max count or greater.

InputOutputs.Name: OnRangeFactorAll
InputOutputs.Description: Outputs the factor of the count of all npcs.

InputOutputs.Name: OnMinPlayerDistAll
InputOutputs.Description: Outputs distance to the NPC, of all NPCs, that is closest to player.

InputOutputs.Name: OnMinCount1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the count of npc 1 transitions to the min count or less.

InputOutputs.Name: OnMaxCount1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the count of npc 1 transitions to the max count or greater.

InputOutputs.Name: OnRangeFactor1
InputOutputs.Description: Outputs the factor of the count of npc 1.

InputOutputs.Name: OnMinPlayerDist1
InputOutputs.Description: Outputs distance to the NPC, of NPCs 1, that is closest to player.

InputOutputs.Name: OnMinCount2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the count of npc 2 transitions to the min count or less.

InputOutputs.Name: OnMaxCount2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the count of npc 2 transitions to the max count or greater.

InputOutputs.Name: OnRangeFactor2
InputOutputs.Description: Outputs the factor of the count of npc 2.

InputOutputs.Name: OnMinPlayerDist2
InputOutputs.Description: Outputs distance to the NPC, of NPCs 2, that is closest to player.

InputOutputs.Name: OnMinCount3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the count of npc 3 transitions to the min count or less.

InputOutputs.Name: OnMaxCount3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the count of npc 3 transitions to the max count or greater.

InputOutputs.Name: OnRangeFactor3
InputOutputs.Description: Outputs the factor of the count of npc 3.

InputOutputs.Name: OnMinPlayerDist3
InputOutputs.Description: Outputs distance to the NPC, of NPCs 3, that is closest to player.

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptFile
InputOutputs.Description: Load and execute a script file

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptCode
InputOutputs.Description: Execute a fragment of script code

InputOutputs.Name: CallScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Call a script function

InputOutputs.Name: CallPrivateScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function from this entity's private script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: CallGlobalScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function in the global script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: Kill
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillHierarchy
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity and all its children from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillConstrained
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity, all its children, and anything constrained to it, from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: AddOutput
InputOutputs.Description: Adds an entity I/O connection to this entity. Parameter format: outputname>targetname>inputname>parameter>delay>max times to fire (-1 == infinite). Very dangerous, use with care.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser1 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser2 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser3 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser4 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser1 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser2 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser3 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser4 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnKilled
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the entity is killed and removed from the game. Parameter is the inflictor.
